title: Downtown 1 bedroom 1 bath Cohasset Apartment
posting_body: Bright and spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment in the heart of Cohasset village.
The Quonahassit Cottage includes all new appliances, new washer and dryer in unit, fresh paint and hardwood floors throughout.
Large extra storage space upstairs not included in square footage.
Large private back yard with garden patio for relaxing and entertaining.
Enjoy the village shops and restaurants just outside your door.
Take a short stroll to Cohasset Common and the harbor.
Owner pays for water and sewer.
Renter responsible for gas, electric, and cable.
Tenant to pay for Cohasset all-facilities pass ($75 per year provides beach parking and access to the Recycling Transfer Facility for trash).
First, last and security due at lease signing.
One parking space (additional parking in village).
